org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.redis.impl

Interface SerializationStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JsonSerializationStrategy

    public interface SerializationStrategy
    Strategy for serializing/deserializing entities within Redis.

    Every strategy can support a different set of data types.

    Author:
    Mark Paluch

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T deserialize(String serialized, Class<T> targetType)
      Deserialize payload into the expected targetType
      GridType overrideType(Type type)
      If the datastore does not support a Type the dialect might override it with a custom one.
      String serialize(Object payload)
      Serialize the payload into the target representation.

    • Method Detail

      • deserialize

        <T> T deserialize(String serialized,
                  Class<T> targetType)
        Deserialize payload into the expected targetType
        Type Parameters:
        T - expected type
        Parameters:
        serialized - string in the serialized form
        targetType - expected type
        Returns:
        the instance of targetType or null

      • serialize

        String serialize(Object payload)
        Serialize the payload into the target representation.
        Parameters:
        payload - the payload
        Returns:
        string containing the target representation

      • overrideType

        GridType overrideType(Type type)
        If the datastore does not support a Type the dialect might override it with a custom one.
        Parameters:
        type - The Type that might need to be overridden
        Returns:
        the GridType instance to use to bind the given type or null if the type does not need to be overridden
